titleStmt.title: An history briefly contayninge that whiche hath happened sens the departure of the house of Guise the constable, and other from the court being at S. Germanis, vntill the present.

notesStmt.note: Imprint and suggested publication date from STC.
Identified as STC 11277 on UMI microfilm reel 241.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
Appears at UMI microfilm reels 241 and 463.
